body_html:
Latest bazel didn't fix this problem:

ERROR: /home/vesnica/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/BUILD:158:1: no such package '@grpc//': Error cloning repository: https://boringssl.googlesource.com/boringssl: cannot open git-upload-pack caused by https://boringssl.googlesource.com/boringssl: cannot open git-upload-pack caused by https://boringssl.googlesource.com/boringssl: cannot open git-upload-pack and referenced by '//tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc:grpc_remote_master'.
ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted.
INFO: Elapsed time: 161.436s

All proxy settings is correct, and there is no issue if I simply run:

git clone --depth 1 --recurse-submodules https://github.com/grpc/grpc.git

Cloning into 'grpc'...
remote: Counting objects: 3401, done.
remote: Compressing objects: 100% (2631/2631), done.
remote: Total 3401 (delta 1667), reused 1305 (delta 596), pack-reused 0
Receiving objects: 100% (3401/3401), 3.65 MiB | 81.00 KiB/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (1667/1667), done.
Checking connectivity... done.
Submodule 'third_party/boringssl' (https://boringssl.googlesource.com/boringssl) registered for path 'third_party/boringssl'

Submodule 'third_party/protobuf' (https://github.com/google/protobuf.git) registered for path 'third_party/protobuf'
Submodule 'third_party/zlib' (https://github.com/madler/zlib) registered for path 'third_party/zlib'
Cloning into 'third_party/boringssl'...
remote: Sending approximately 23.14 MiB ...
remote: Counting objects: 3021, done
remote: Finding sources: 100% (424/424)
remote: Total 23388 (delta 14683), reused 23347 (delta 14683)
Receiving objects: 100% (23388/23388), 22.97 MiB | 327.00 KiB/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (14683/14683), done.
Checking connectivity... done.
Submodule path 'third_party/boringssl': checked out '9f897b25800d2f54f5c442ef01a60721aeca6d87'

body:
Latest bazel didn't fix this problem:

```
ERROR: /home/vesnica/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/BUILD:158:1: no such package '@grpc//': Error cloning repository: https://boringssl.googlesource.com/boringssl: cannot open git-upload-pack caused by https://boringssl.googlesource.com/boringssl: cannot open git-upload-pack caused by https://boringssl.googlesource.com/boringssl: cannot open git-upload-pack and referenced by '//tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc:grpc_remote_master'.
ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted.
INFO: Elapsed time: 161.436s
```

All proxy settings is correct, and there is no issue if I simply run:

```
git clone --depth 1 --recurse-submodules https://github.com/grpc/grpc.git
```

```
Cloning into 'grpc'...
```
